tools.name: Icarus Mod Manager 2 Full
tools.author: Jimk72
tools.description: Full Release. Icarus Mod Manager 2.2.1 this is not backwards compatible with previous 1.6.7 or earlier versions! The folder structure has changed. Please create a new folder for this to be unzipped into. Make sure you click check for update after installed.

tools.name: Icarus Mod Editor
tools.author: Jimk72
tools.description: Allows creation of mods and installation into Icarus game.
